inclusion.criterion: gestational diabetes mellitus in accordance with the IADPSG criteria between 24 and 31+6 weeks of gestation by a 2h 75g OGTT
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Overt diabetes (i.e. pregestationally known type 1 or type 2 diabetes or fasting plasma glucose during the OGTT ≥126 mg/dl [7.0 mmol/l] or HbA1c ≥6.5% [44 mmol/l] or 2h post-load OGTT levels ≥200 mg/dl [11.1 mmol/l])
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of bariatric surgery or other surgeries that induce malabsorption
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: long-term use (>2 weeks) of systemic steroids prior to enrolment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients already using glucose lowering medications (metformin or insulin) before study entry
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: fetal growth restriction due to placental dysfunction at study entry - Inpatient
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: psychiatric treatment up to 1 year before enrolment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in this study in previous pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant presenting with jaundice. She was born at 38w3d of gestation, after an uncomplicated pregnancy.
